facts: I taught Elvis Presley how to dance
I had braces on my legs when I was a kid
I drank 15 Dr Peppers in one day
I have met the president 3 times
I can assemble a M14 rifle really quickly
My friend Bubba taught me all about shrimpin'
Most important thing I learned in Vietnam was to take care of your feet
I went to the People's Republic of China during the Ping-Pong Diplomacy period
The Watergate scandal was discovered by a call I made to the hotel front desk
I have run across the United States several times
My son's name is also Forrest

education.name: Greenbow High School
highlights: Found a seat on the school bus
Recruited by Univeristy of Alabama to play football
other: Had a best friend named Jenny

education.name: University of Alabama
highlights: Played football as a kick returner
other: Visited Jenny at her all girl's college

details: Cut grass on a Snapper ridind mower.
And 'cause I was gazillionaire and I liked doing it so much, I cut that grass for free
Helped to inspire the smiley face T-shirt.
Lead marketing effort for "5h!t happens" bumper sticker.
After Hurricane Carmen ran through Bayou La Batres, we were the only boat left. After that, shrimpin' was easy.
